about_the_game:
Man the turrets!

Heroes of Higher Realms is an epic tower defense game where you must summon and command a powerful army of heroes and towers to defend your realm from the forces of darkness.
In this innovative twist on the classic tower defense genre, you will need to use your strategic skills to place your heroes and towers wisely, and to upgrade them with powerful abilities, in order to defeat the waves of increasingly powerful enemies that will come your way.
With many unique heroes and towers to choose from, and a variety of different game modes to enjoy and build better economy and power, Heroes of Higher Realms offers something for everyone. Whether you're a casual tower defense fan or a hardcore strategist, you're sure to find something to challenge and entertain you in this epic game.
Key Features:
Over 50 unique heroes and towers to choose from, each with their own unique abilities and playstyles.
A variety of different game modes to enjoy, including campaign mode, endless mode, and challenge mode.
A deep and rewarding strategy system that allows you to customize your army and tactics to suit your playstyle.
Epic boss battles that will test your skills to the limit.
Stunning visuals and immersive sound effects.
If you're looking for a challenging and rewarding tower defense game that will keep you coming back for more, then Heroes of Higher Realms is the game for you!


Additional notes:


Heroes of Higher Realms is still in development, but we are planning to release it on Steam in early 2025.
We are offering a special discount to our early supporters, so be sure to add the game to your wishlist now!
We are also open to feedback from our community, so please feel free to share your thoughts and suggestions with us.
We hope to see you on the battlefield soon!
